message:
Dears , 
i want to Create Win Application using WPF , the app will be used with touch Screens , so it will have animation , drag and drop ... 
any suggestion for third party Libraries

data.message: Mohamed Hammad  if you know how to support him

as far as I know, WPF already has great support for touch, almost all controls have events for touch (as well as mouse and stylus), so I don't think you'll need any 3rd-party libraries.

Edit: also consider making a universal windows app (aka metro/modern), the XAML and code are very similar and the platform is designed to work great with touch.
